name: Space Hunter (cgiovano)
description:
Based on old arcade games like Galaga. Destroy the enemies and fight against the bosses.

The game is still in development, so may contain some bugs. Please comment here if you find any. Consider donate, you'll be helping to improve this little project.

how to play: use A, W, S, D keys to move ENTER to confirm action, P to pause, N to shoot and 1, 2, 3 to select weapons.
